related_questions.question: Why are solar stocks up?
related_questions.snippet: In retaliation to increased tariffs, China let its currency fall to record lows. US solar stocks tumbled as a lower currency would make Chinese counterparts more attractive, ultimately increasing competition. The biggest among solar companies by market cap, First Solar (FSLR) stock fell around 4% in August.Aug 31, 2019
